name: Introduction to Zoology
description: This course introduces students to the study of zoology, including the origin and evolution of animals, the anatomy and physiology of animals, and the behavior of animals.

name: Vertebrate Biology
description: This course provides an overview of vertebrate biology and the evolutionary relationships between different vertebrate groups, including fishes, amphibians, reptiles, birds, and mammals.

name: Ornithology
description: This course examines the biology and ecology of birds, including bird anatomy, physiology, behavior, evolution, ecology, and conservation.
